timeline.bodyText: Maybe IgnoreInJenkinsOnWindows would be a less confusing name.
timeline.author: jbartok
timeline.diffHunk:

+ * This is typically used for tests which use docker. + */ +public interface IgnoreOnJenkinsWindows {
